languages.text: "Эдельтрад". {n}Тон Теодоры заставляет мужчину умолкнуть.{/n} "Кажется, я дала тебе назначение на этом корабле. Так потрудись объяснить, почему же Старший Конгрегатор все еще торчит на офицерской палубе вместо того, чтобы проследовать на средние палубы и начать осмотр подотчетных отсеков?"

traits.locale_text: "Эдельтрад". {n}Тон Теодоры заставляет мужчину умолкнуть.{/n} "Кажется, я дала тебе назначение на этом корабле. Так потрудись объяснить, почему же Старший Конгрегатор все еще торчит на офицерской палубе вместо того, чтобы проследовать на средние палубы и начать осмотр подотчетных отсеков?"

languages.text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"
languages.original_text: "Эдельтрад". {n}Тон Теодоры заставляет мужчину умолкнуть.{/n} "Кажется, я дала тебе назначение на этом корабле. Так потрудись объяснить, почему же Старший Конгрегатор все еще торчит на офицерской палубе вместо того, чтобы проследовать на средние палубы и начать осмотр подотчетных отсеков?"

traits.locale_text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Then would you care to explain to me why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the chambers in his purview?"

"Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Then would you care to explain to me why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the chambers in his purview?"

"Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"

"Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"

"Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"

languages.text: “艾德萨德。”{n}西奥多拉的话让他住了口。{/n}“我相信，我已经分配给了你一个任务。那么，请你向我解释一下，为什么我的高阶聚合官没有去中层甲板检查他负责的舱室，却仍然在军官甲板上磨磨蹭蹭呢？”
languages.original_text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"

traits.locale_text: “艾德萨德。”{n}西奥多拉的话让他住了口。{/n}“我相信，我已经分配给了你一个任务。那么，请你向我解释一下，为什么我的高阶聚合官没有去中层甲板检查他负责的舱室，却仍然在军官甲板上磨磨蹭蹭呢？”

languages.text: «Edelthrad». {n}El tono de Theodora no admite réplica.{/n} «Juraría que te había asignado una tarea en esta nave. ¿Serías tan amable de explicarme por qué mi congregador veterano sigue en la cubierta de oficiales en vez de ir a la cubierta central para inspeccionar los compartimentos que tiene asignados?».
languages.original_text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"

traits.locale_text: «Edelthrad». {n}El tono de Theodora no admite réplica.{/n} «Juraría que te había asignado una tarea en esta nave. ¿Serías tan amable de explicarme por qué mi congregador veterano sigue en la cubierta de oficiales en vez de ir a la cubierta central para inspeccionar los compartimentos que tiene asignados?».

languages.text: 「エデルスラド…」{n}シオドーラの口調が彼を黙らせた。{/n}「私は、あなたにこの船での任務を与えたはずです。それにもかかわらず、なぜ会合取締役が、自分の権限内にある区画の検査を開始するために中層デッキに進まず、士官デッキでまだブラブラしている理由を説明しなさい」
languages.original_text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"

traits.locale_text: 「エデルスラド」{n}テオドラの口調が彼を黙らせた。{/n}「私はあなたにこの船での任務を与えたと思います。それなら、なぜ会合取締役が、自分の権限内にある区画の検査を開始するために中デッキに進まず、士官デッキでまだぶらぶらしている理由を説明してくれませんか？」
「エデルスラド…」{n}シオドーラの口調が彼を黙らせた。{/n}「私は、あなたにこの船での任務を与えたはずです。それにもかかわらず、なぜ会合取締役が、自分の権限内にある区画の検査を開始するために中層デッキに進まず、士官デッキでまだブラブラしている理由を説明しなさい」

languages.text: « Edelthrad, {n}intervient Théodora sur un ton qui le réduit au silence.{/n} Il me semble vous avoir donné une mission sur ce vaisseau. Expliquez-moi alors pourquoi mon congrégateur en chef traîne encore sur le pont des officiers au lieu de se rendre dans les ponts intermédiaires pour commencer l'inspection des compartiments dont il a la responsabilité ? »
languages.original_text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"

traits.locale_text: « Edelthrad, » {n}intervient Théodora sur un ton qui le réduit au silence.{/n} Il me semble vous avoir donné une mission sur ce vaisseau. Expliquez-moi alors pourquoi mon congrégateur en chef traîne encore sur le pont des officiers au lieu de se rendre dans les ponts intermédiaires pour commencer l'inspection des compartiments dont il a la responsabilité ? »

languages.text: "Edelthrad!" {n}Theodoras Tonfall lässt ihn schweigen.{/n} "Ich glaube, ich habe Euch eine Aufgabe auf diesem Schiff gegeben. Erklärt mir bitte, warum mein leitender Congregator immer noch auf dem Offiziersdeck herumtrödelt, anstatt auf den mittleren Decks mit der Inspektion der ihm zugewiesenen Abteile zu beginnen?"
languages.original_text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"

traits.locale_text: "Edelthrad!" {n}Theodoras Tonfall lässt ihn schweigen.{/n} "Ich glaube, ich habe Euch eine Aufgabe auf diesem Schiff gegeben. Erklärt mir bitte, warum mein leitender Congregator immer noch auf dem Offiziersdeck herumtrödelt, anstatt auf den mittleren Decks mit der Inspektion der ihm zugewiesenen Abteile zu beginnen?"

languages.text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora'nın ses tonu adamı susturuyor.{/n} "Sana bu gemide bir görev verdiğimi sanıyorum. O hâlde bana Kıdemli Kurultaycımın orta güvertelere doğru ilerleyerek yetki alanı içindeki kompartımanları teftişe başlamak yerine neden subay güvertesinde aylaklık ettiğini izah et."
languages.original_text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"

traits.locale_text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora'nın ses tonu adamı susturuyor.{/n} "Sana bu gemide bir görev verdiğimi sanıyorum. O hâlde bana Kıdemli Kurultaycı'mın orta güvertelere doğru ilerleyerek yetki alanı içindeki kompartımanları teftişe başlamak yerine neden subay güvertesinde aylaklık ettiğini izah et."

languages.original_text: "Edelthrad." {n}Theodora's tone renders him silent.{/n} "I believe I gave you an assignment on this ship. Explain to me, then, why my Senior Congregator is still dawdling about the officers' deck instead of proceeding to the middle decks to commence the inspection of the compartments in his purview?"
